post.body: then do Havi's favorite video and if you don't like it, I can recommend others to try! :))
hell, I want them too!
I know, how dare you try to cut me off! and on a compliment!
soon to be best selling best of 2009 on Oprah change the world BOOK
It might be there, snow between me and mail box so will venture soon! Can't wait to read your wonderful, amazing, incredible
You focus on the boys... we've got your back.
Ankle deep is good. Five minutes... one minute... the mind loves to say it has to be 2 hours to matter. Its lying.
no, it's age. If we want something, we go buy it
You're too busy for yoga because you are spending all your time on teasing us with your picture
I started back meditating regularly again too... feels spacious and steady-making.
Hmmm... @Havi will have opinions and I would ask: are you a video (visual) learner or more audio? Have you ever take a class?
oh my god! Wow, this is huge. I expect you won't be be on the call today?
oh Barbara, yeah for saying yes to the Comfort Queen's 2009 Virtual Retreat - I'm so excited!
oh thank you! We were going to try and buy a Christmas tree from the farm but they were closed... so we went to the Boy Scouts!
but the second sounds like more fun
of course, i am old enough now to like the large font... but NEVER the fake yellow highlighter :)
lovely my wonderful amazing and utterly on top of it but without beer launch magician
Perfecto, I will be writing all day and can speak at your utter and immense convenience
Hey Mister, how's it going? Can we touch base tomorrow?
I'm glad you are home safe and sorry hubby is cranky.. perhaps he needs a glass of wine, too. We have so much snow here!
are you home??
my wee dogs got all beat up from the icy crust - but they had a blast!
I might just try this- wait, me cooking? RT@MindfulMomma making cinnamon roasted almonds - http://tinyurl.com/6ectar
Interview with SELF mag; writer listens in as I coach someone on stress eating.They mean well but the soul is not fed with soundbites.
RT:@davidhenderson Is it possible that perhaps as much as 11% of the world's population has become "social media gurus?"
RT:@copyblogger “No fear. No distractions. The ability to let that which does not matter truly slide.” - http://is.gd/3lvw
I love what @Pace said this week - and last. There must be a reason she writes about communication. http://is.gd/bHCZ
Send love to @shaboom who broke her left wrist yesterday! :(((
Shiva is here http://is.gd/cXUN @monagrayson :))
And the reading of blog comments before practices:http://is.gd/cSiA - I love reading these!
Getting ready to Shiva and meditate and then write, write, write. Still feels like a holiday hence the twittering before practices :)
I just joined the integral-twits Twitter Group http://tgr.me/g/integral-twits and you can too. Please Retweet.
Playing http://play.sockandawe.com/ side by side with boyfriend - very satisfying
Thanks to @RockYourDay's help @zenatplay Which reminds me, your preferred subscriber email was beautifully written.
Another beautiful description @LuminousHeart http://twitpic.com/v4wa - @hiroboga saw shape of the wind. I, shape of the water
Time to celebrate the solstice with a walk in the snow!
Reading @JohnnyBTruant 's book and drinking wine at the same time is NOT recommended unless you like wine through the nose
It's Choose Your Life Mondays: The Holiday Edition http://is.gd/cSiA - (I know it's not Monday quite yet but just in case we lose power)
RT:@blissfulfun according to my inbox, the true meaning of Christmas must be a link to a Red headline salespage (argh, hate that!)
RT:@HiroBoga So much snow blowing about, I can see the shape of the wind. Weirdly beautiful. (what a lovely image, Hiro!)
